name: Deadpool
text: The Regeneratin' Degenerate — Forced Interrupt: When you would be defeated, instead set your hit point dial to 1, change to alter-ego form, and add 1 acceleration token to the main scheme.

flavor: "Sometimes I'm a mutant, sometimes I'm not. Depends on who you ask."
name: Wade Wilson
text: Break the Fourth Wall — Action: Discard a card from your hand → search your deck for a Deadpool event and add it to your hand. (Limit once per round.)

name: Cable
text: [star] Cable gets +1 THW and +1 ATK for each acceleration token on the main scheme (to a maximum of +3 THW and +3 ATK.)

name: Exhausting Personality
text: Hero Action: Choose: • Place 1 acceleration token on the main scheme → stun and confuse the villain. • Exhaust a player's identity → that player draws 1 card for each acceleration token on the main scheme.

flavor: "This is gonna hurt me as much as it hurts you." —Deadpool
name: Maximum Effort
text: Hero Action (attack): Take any amount of damage up to your remaining hit points → deal an equal amount of damage to an enemy.

flavor: "It says here I defeat you with a wedgie." —Deadpool
name: Metaknowledge
text: Hero Interrupt: When an encounter card is revealed, cancel all of its effects and discard it. Take 1 damage for each icon ([star] and [boost]) in that card's boost area.

name: "Yoo-Hoo!"
text: Hero Action (thwart): Take any amount of damage up to your remaining hit points → remove an equal amount of threat from a scheme.

name: Montage
text: This card generates 1 additional [wild] resource for each acceleration token on the main scheme (to a maximum of 3 additional resources).

flavor: "Did someone say, 'Chimichanga'? Nevermind. That was just the sound of my skull and brains healing." —Deadpool
name: Chimichanga Truck
text: Response: After an identity makes a basic recovery, exhaust Chimichanga Truck → ready that identity.

name: Armed to the Teeth
text: Response: After you play Armed to the Teeth, search your collection for 1 [[WEAPON]] upgrade from any aspect and attach it facedown here. Action: Exhaust Armed to the Teeth → swap the card attached here with a [[WEAPON]] upgrade you control.

name: Deadpool's Katana
text: Restricted. Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Deadpool's Katana and take 1 damage → deal 2 damage to an enemy. This attack gains piercing.

flavor: "I've got you right where I want you." —Deadpool
name: It Ain't Over...
text:
Attach to the main scheme.
Increase the target threat value of attached scheme by 2 for each acceleration token on it.

name: This Card is Fire
text: Forced Response: After your turn ends, if this card is in your hand, take 1 damage. Hero Action (attack): Deal X damage to an enemy. X is the amount of damage you have sustained.

name: Dogpool
text: Retaliate 1. Toughness. When Defeated: Deal 1 damage to an enemy.

name: Headpool
text: [star] Response: After Headpool attacks and damages a minion, that minion attacks another enemy of your choice.

flavor: "Congratulations on having me in your deck."
name: Kidpool
text: [star] Kidpool's attacks gain piercing.

name: Lady Deadpool
text: When Defeated: Defeat a non-[[ELITE]] minion.

name: Barely a Scratch
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage from an attack, prevent 1 of that damage for each [crisis], [acceleration], [amplify], and [hazard] in play.

name: Cutupper
text: Max 1 per deck. Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. Stun that enemy.

name: Da Bomb
text: Max 1 per deck. Hero Action: Deal 10 damage to the villain. Deal 1 damage to each enemy and hero for each [crisis], [acceleration], [amplify], and [hazard] in play.

name: Get Rage-y
text: Max 1 per deck. Action: Ready an ally. That ally gets +1 ATK until the end of the phase.

name: "I Got This"
text: Hero Action: If the following icons are on 1 or more cards in play: [crisis] — Deal 3 damage to an enemy. [acceleration] — Remove 2 threat from a scheme. [amplify] — Ready an ally you control. [hazard] — Draw 1 card.

name: Not my Responsibility
text: Max 1 per deck. Interrupt: When any amount of threat would be placed on a scheme, you or your ally takes it as damage instead.

name: 'Pool Inspection
text: Max 1 per deck. Hero Action (thwart): Remove 5 threat from the main scheme, ignoring the crisis icon ([crisis]). Remove 1 threat from each scheme for each [crisis], [acceleration], [amplify], and [hazard] in play.

flavor: "♫ Nothing can cause me pain! Not even an oncoming tr...♪" —Deadpool
name: Live Dangerously
text:
Victory 0.
Each identity gets +2 hand size.

name: Self Confidence
text:
Max 1 per deck.
Double the number of resources this card generates if your identity has sustained less than 5 damage (triple the resources instead if you have sustained no damage).

name: Self Control
text:
Max 1 per deck.
Double the number of resources this card generates if your identity has sustained less than 5 damage (triple the resources instead if you have sustained no damage).

name: Self Preservation
text:
Max 1 per deck.
Double the number of resources this card generates if your identity has sustained less than 5 damage (triple the resources instead if you have sustained no damage).

name: Git Gud
text: Reduce the cost to play Git Gud by 2 if you did not win your previous game of Marvel Champions. Forced Interrupt: When a player would be defeated, they set their hit point dial to 1 and change to alter-ego form instead. Remove this card from the game.

flavor: "Now I'm the best at whatever it is Wolverine does." —Deadpool
name: Healing Factor
text: Max 1 per player. Response: After the player phase begins, exhaust Healing Factor → heal 2 damage from your identity.

flavor: "Acquiesce? I don't know the meaning of the word." —Deadpool
name: Stick-To-Itiveness
text: Max 1 per deck. Hero Action: Spend a [physical] resource and exhaust this card → ready your hero.

name: Bob, Agent of Hydra
text: Response: After Bob, Agent of Hydra enters play, deal 2 damage to an enemy or remove 1 threat from a scheme.

name: Negasonic Teenage Warhead
text: Interrupt: When a treachery is revealed, deal 2 damage to Negasonic Teenage Warhead → cancel that treachery's "When Revealed" effects.

flavor: What's black and white and red all over?
name: Pandapool
text: Toughness.

name: Break Time
text: Alliance. Max 1 per deck. Alter-Ego Action: Take a group break. Leave the table. Read a comic book. When you come back to the game, heal 1 damage from each identity for every minute you were away from the game.

name: Get in Front of Me!
text: Max 1 per deck. Hero Interrupt: When a treachery card is revealed from the encounter deck, cancel its "When Revealed" effects. The villain attacks you instead. If an ally or another hero defends this attack, draw 1 card.

flavor: "This hand could be so much better!" —Deadpool
name: Mulligan
text: You cannot play this card if you have played another card this phase. Action: Discard your hand. Draw a new hand. (Draw up to your hand size.)

flavor: This spaceship serves as the Deadpool Corps' mobile base of operations.
name: Deadpool Corps Ship
text: Action: Exhaust Deadpool Corps Ship and deal yourself 1 facedown encounter card → put a 'Pool ally into play from your hand.

name: Plot Convenience
text: Action: Exhaust Plot Convenience → choose: • Attach 1 aspect card from your hand facedown here (to a maximum of 3). • Add 1 card attached facedown here to your hand. Any player may trigger this ability.

name: Ambush
text: Attach to a side scheme. Max 1 per side scheme. Interrupt: When attached side scheme is defeated, discard a non-[[ELITE]] minion.

name: Bazooka
text: Restricted. Max 2 per deck. Hero Action (attack): Discard Bazooka → deal 1 damage to an enemy for each [crisis], [acceleration], [amplify], and [hazard] in play. This attack gains ranged.

name: Blackout
text: Hero Action: Spend 1 resource of any type → move 1 threat from a scheme to an empty space above that matches the spent resource. If all spaces above are filled, discard this card and confuse the villain.

name: Distraction
text:
Attach to a non-[[ELITE]] minion. Max 1 per minion.
Attached minion cannot activate.

name: Laser Swords
text:
Counts as 2 restricted cards. Max 1 per deck.
Your hero gets +1 ATK for each [crisis], [acceleration], [amplify], and [hazard] in play (to a maximum of +4 ATK).

name: Rock, Paper, Scissors
text: Hero Action: Exhaust this card, choose 1 card in your hand, and discard the top card of your deck → using the diagram above, if a printed resource on the chosen card beats (points to) a printed resource on the discarded card, add the discarded card to your hand.

name: Tic-Tac-Toe
text: Hero Action: Spend 1 resource of any type → move 1 damage from a character to an empty space above matching the spent resource. If there are 3 damage tokens in a line, deal all damage on this card to an enemy and discard this card.

name: War
text: Hero Action: Exhaust War → discard the top card of the encounter deck. Take 1 damage for each icon ([star] and [boost]) in the boost area of that card. Discard the top card of your deck. Deal damage to an enemy equal to that card's cost.
